attributes.additional_details:
Cut International Aid NOW.

Our Country needs this money more each day than the Rich Counties we send it to.

Lets get our OWN Country in  order first before we send aid like helping the people who have been under water  since January or before and we have areas that are being flooded every winter, not only them the NHS, the Police and the Main Services, We should not have to make a decision on who we help first. These are all TOP PRIORITIES.

This is our money the TAX PAYERS and we say help our own FIRST.

Charity starts at home and this is our home.
